name: LOST SPACE MAN GAME
description:
Our Game talking about a spaceman who is lost in space and trying to get back to his family. controls are easy:  In Chapter 1 : WASD In Chapter 2: WASD  and [1] [2] [3] In Chapter 3: soon

The Game was made by:
Programming part: Alex, John, and Al Hussien Mohamed
Art part: John, Al Hussien Mohamed and MeMeDumDum  Music part: DevLooper
